name: Penguinapocalypse
description:
Use the mouse (left button) to spawn zombie-penguins in on the non-infected penguins. Infect them all, and yes; there will be blood.

Game was made alone by me for the Home of Nerds game jam.

Theme: "Dying is good".

If you want to play the version which contains music (which I personally don't suggest despite being the creator of the music) then download 'PenguinapocalypseMusic'. However if you are happy with silence: 'Penguinapocalypse'.

I participated as a soloist in the HON jam & my Discord name is:

TheLynx
